title: [Feature Request] PyTorch RNN State Dropout
body_html:
Deepmind released a paper researching the effectiveness of LSTMs: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1707.05589.pdf

For the paper, they used RNN dropout for the RNN hidden state. Without manually unrolling the RNN, could the LSTM and GRU cell include state_dropout?

Looks like the current RNN cells only support between layer dropout.
